Items: The mayor denied the DOTP's request. The fair did not take place. Citizens are not happy with this decision. (- 10 reputation with the rich)

The mayor refused permission to leave for Baroness Windfield.
The mayor has banned the Willis family from leaving the city. The petitioners are unhappy. (- 3 reputation with the rich)

The mayor has banned postal clerk Fingspoon from leaving town.
The mayor refused to seize the property of Countess Lowens for medical needs. The Countess appreciated this gesture. (+ 5 reputation with the rich)

The mayor decided not to volunteer to solve the problem with Mr. Hoff's neighbor. Nothing terrible happened, but the residents of the area are alarmed and unhappy with the inaction of the authorities. (- 10 reputation with the rich)
Four volunteers joined the mayor's office.
The mayor did not send a volunteer to find the boy. That night, someone was in charge of several houses: he took the gingerbread and left traces of the disease. The spread of the pain has intensified
Yesterday, a dance festival hosted by residents took place on the town square. They shared a good mood with each other and, perhaps, something else. The spread of the disease has intensified
The mayor turned out to encourage volunteers. Two of them left the service.
Disinfection in the city was not carried out. The spread of the disease has intensified.

The doctors did not test the vaccine.
